title: Fragments, 1770–90
dimensions:
A. Warp: 90cm (35 3/8in.) Weft:43cm (16 3/4in.)
B. Warp: 59cm (23 1/4in.). Weft: 60cm (23 1/2in.
Both pieces have a selvedge on the left.
description: Two different balloons arranged in vertical stripes as an offset pattern. Both balloons have baskets carrying passengers and are probably after contemporary prints of balloonists. Picottage background with scattered birds and butterflies. In black, two reds, lavender and blue.

tombstone.epitaph: Fragments, 1770–90.Block-printed on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-214-a,b.
